text: David Lobell is an agricultural ecologist and an Associate Professor in Environmental Earth System Science at Stanford University. He won a MacArthur Award in 2013. ==Work== Lobell's work deals primarily with food security. He also investigates the impact of climate change on crop yields. ==References== Category:MacArthur Fellows Category:Stanford University staff Category:Brown University alumni Category:Stanford University alumni Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Stanford, California
title: David Lobell
